Title: Silvertone CURFEW Watch Light Purple Face in Square Setting
Description: Silvertone CURFEW Watch Light Purple Face in Square Setting This is a silvertone watch from CURFEW. It is about 7" long. The band has rhinestones on a 1" section on either side of the face.  This watch comes from old stock, but needs a new battery. This watch is new, unused but is no longer in the original packaging. Charity.Mission: MacHub is a division of Yamhill County Gospel Rescue Mission. MacHub partners with YCGRM to provide needed shelter, support, hope, and job opportunities.
